languages.text: {n}Мужчина, чья голова из-за безобразных ожогов похожа на оплавленный ком воска, выходит вперед. Один его глаз затянут бельмом, но второй смотрит зорко.{/n} "Я слышал шаттл, и вот вы — не десятина, не клерки, а гости с Расколотого Неба. Наш долгожданный шанс".

{n}A man steps forward. The hideous burns on his head make it look like a ball of molten wax. The pupil of one of his eyes is clouded, but the other eye is sharp and alert.{/n} "I heard a shuttle, and here you are. Not a tithe, not clerks, but guests from the Riven Sky — the chance we've long been waiting for."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина, чья голова из-за безобразных ожогов похожа на оплавленный ком воска, выходит вперед. Один его глаз затянут бельмом, но второй смотрит зорко.{/n} "Я слышал шаттл, и вот вы — не десятина, не клерки, а гости с Расколотого Неба. Наш долгожданный шанс".

languages.text: {n}Un hombre da un paso adelante. Las horrendas quemaduras de su cabeza hacen que parezca una esfera de cera derretida. La pupila de uno de sus ojos está empañada, pero su otro ojo está atento y alerta.{/n} «Oí una lanzadera y aquí está. Ni un diezmo ni funcionarios, sino invitados del Cielo Desgarrado. Es la oportunidad que llevamos tanto tiempo esperando».
languages.original_text: {n}A man steps forward. The hideous burns on his head make it look like a ball of molten wax. The pupil of one of his eyes is clouded, but the other eye is sharp and alert.{/n} "I heard a shuttle, and here you are. Not a tithe, not clerks, but guests from the Riven Sky — the chance we've long been waiting for."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un hombre da un paso adelante. Las horrendas quemaduras de su cabeza hacen que parezca una esfera de cera derretida. La pupila de uno de sus ojos está empañada, pero su otro ojo está atento y alerta.{/n} «Oí una lanzadera y aquí está. Ni un diezmo ni funcionarios, sino invitados del Cielo Desgarrado. Es la oportunidad que llevamos tanto tiempo esperando».

languages.text: {n}一个男人走上前来，他的头带着可怕的烧伤痕迹，看起来就像个熔化的蜡球一样。他一只眼睛瞳孔浑浊，但另一只眼睛却敏锐、警觉。{/n}“我听到了穿梭机的声音，随后你就来了。你不是什一税的资源，也不是内政部的职员，而是破碎之空派来的客人。我们一直在等待这个机会，已经等很久了。”
languages.original_text: {n}A man steps forward. The hideous burns on his head make it look like a ball of molten wax. The pupil of one of his eyes is clouded, but the other eye is sharp and alert.{/n} "I heard a shuttle, and here you are. Not a tithe, not clerks, but guests from the Riven Sky — the chance we've long been waiting for."

traits.locale_text: {n}一个男人走上前来，他的头带着可怕的烧伤痕迹，看起来就像个熔化的蜡球一样。他一只眼睛瞳孔浑浊，但另一只眼睛却敏锐、警觉。{/n}“我听到了穿梭机的声音，随后你就来了。你不是什一税的资源，也不是内政部的职员，而是破碎之空派来的客人。我们一直在等待这个机会，已经等很久了。”

languages.text: {n}一人の男が前に出る。彼の頭におぞましい火傷がそれを溶けた蝋のボールのように見えさせる。彼の目の片方の瞳孔が曇っているが、もう一方の目は鋭く、注意深い。{/n}「シャトルについて聞いていた。そしてあんたがここにいる。租税でもなく、役人でもなく、割れた空からのお客さんだ―この機会を待っていた」
languages.original_text: {n}A man steps forward. The hideous burns on his head make it look like a ball of molten wax. The pupil of one of his eyes is clouded, but the other eye is sharp and alert.{/n} "I heard a shuttle, and here you are. Not a tithe, not clerks, but guests from the Riven Sky — the chance we've long been waiting for."

traits.locale_text: {n}一人の男が前に出る。彼の頭におぞましい火傷がそれを溶けた蝋のボールのように見えさせる。彼の目の片方の瞳孔が曇っているが、もう一方の目は鋭く、注意深い。{/n}「シャトルについて聞いていた。そしてあんたがここにいる。租税でもなく、役人でもなく、割れた空からのお客さんだ―この機会を待っていた」

languages.text: {n}Un homme s'avance d'un pas. Les affreuses brûlures qui défigurent son crâne lui donnent l'apparence d'une boule de cire partiellement fondue. L'une de ses pupilles est voilée, mais l'autre œil reste vif et acéré.{/n} « J'ai entendu une navette, et voilà que vous débarquez sans crier gare. Ni tributs destinés à la dîme, ni greffiers, mais des émissaires en provenance de la Fracture Céleste... l'occasion que nous attendions depuis si longtemps. »
languages.original_text: {n}A man steps forward. The hideous burns on his head make it look like a ball of molten wax. The pupil of one of his eyes is clouded, but the other eye is sharp and alert.{/n} "I heard a shuttle, and here you are. Not a tithe, not clerks, but guests from the Riven Sky — the chance we've long been waiting for."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un homme s'avance d'un pas. Les affreuses brûlures qui défigurent son crâne lui donnent l'apparence d'une boule de cire partiellement fondue. L'une de ses pupilles est voilée, mais l'autre œil reste vif et acéré.{/n} « J'ai entendu une navette, et voilà que vous débarquez sans crier gare. Ni tributs destinés à la dîme, ni greffiers, mais des émissaires en provenance de la Fracture Céleste... l'occasion que nous attendions depuis si longtemps. »

languages.text: {n}Bir adam öne çıkıyor. Kafasındaki korkunç yanık izleri yüzünden başı, erimiş bal mumundan bir topu andırıyor. Gözlerinden birinin bebeği bulanık, diğer gözüyse keskin ve tetikte.{/n} "Mekik sesi duydum, sonra siz geldiniz. Aşar veya kâtip değil... Çatlak Gök'ün misafirleri. Uzun zamandır beklediğimiz fırsat."
languages.original_text: {n}A man steps forward. The hideous burns on his head make it look like a ball of molten wax. The pupil of one of his eyes is clouded, but the other eye is sharp and alert.{/n} "I heard a shuttle, and here you are. Not a tithe, not clerks, but guests from the Riven Sky — the chance we've long been waiting for."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir adam öne çıkıyor. Kafasındaki korkunç yanık izleri yüzünden başı, erimiş bal mumundan bir topu andırıyor. Gözlerinden birinin bebeği bulanık, diğer gözüyse keskin ve tetikte.{/n} "Mekik sesi duydum, sonra siz geldiniz. Aşar veya kâtip değil... Çatlak Gök'ün misafirleri. Uzun zamandır beklediğimiz fırsat."

languages.text: {n}Ein Mann tritt vor. Schwere Verbrennungen lassen seinen Kopf wie eine Kugel aus geschmolzenem Wachs erscheinen. Eines seiner Augen ist blind, aber das andere ist scharf und wachsam.{/n} "Ich habe ein Shuttle gehört und da seid Ihr. Kein Zehnt, keine Beamten, sondern Gäste aus dem Gespaltenen Himmel ... die Chance, auf die wir lange gewartet haben."
languages.original_text: {n}A man steps forward. The hideous burns on his head make it look like a ball of molten wax. The pupil of one of his eyes is clouded, but the other eye is sharp and alert.{/n} "I heard a shuttle, and here you are. Not a tithe, not clerks, but guests from the Riven Sky — the chance we've long been waiting for."
